game_description: Gamified training simulation. One of the first simulations made by Virtual Dawn, now remastered with amazing interactions. In this simulation you'll learn what it takes to run an industrial dishwashing machine. Process learning with Finnish pedagogy and a fun gamified scenario against food zombies. We do our best to keep as much educational content free as possible. To support us you can follow Virtual Dawn in Linkedin/Discord and stay up to date with our crowd funding projects, purchase our upcoming video games and download and share our free content! Remember to share this content if you think it's good and you learned something! Simulation has been developed with Seinäjoki Vocational School (SEDU)
review_1: Best game ever. The mechanics in the game are great and I haven’t even started on the graphics. I would rather play this game than miss a year 8 english lesson. Best game ever. 為什麼不能
